downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 White Paper: Developing Mobile Apps
downloadDescription: This white paper describes how developers can build a mobile app to communicate with Microsoft Dynamics AX from a phone or tablet device.

downloadFile.name: Developing Secure Mobile Apps for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/e/7/c/e7c983fe-004e-42c1-a6eb-67b8ac88acab/Developing Secure Mobile Apps for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.pdf

detailsSection: The paper provides walkthroughs with sample code to demonstrate how mobile or tablet apps authenticate users and connect to Microsoft Dynamics AX. It also includes a sample solution to address the simple user scenario of an employee being able to capture information about expenses they have incurred while traveling.
detailsSection_file_name: Developing Secure Mobile Apps for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
